prompt:

response:

1. If I accept now, I get $4500, but due to 20% inflation, it's only worth $3600 to me
2. If I reject and make a counter-offer next round, any amount will be worth even less (40% less than original value)
3. Bob's previous rejection of my 5500/4500 split shows he wants more than 4500
4. Given the asymmetric inflation (20% for me vs 10% for Bob), Bob has a stronger negotiating position

Even though this isn't ideal, the inflation penalty makes it better to accept now than to continue negotiating.

{"decision": "accept"}
